title: First Look at Land Rover’s Baby Electric Defender
description: In the land of big, bad SUVs with a rugged edge, Land Rover is one of the best. descriptionSummary: Amongst the rugged giants that dominate the SUV landscape, Land Rover stands out as a master of unbridled capability and refined elegance. Its iconic models offer an unbeatable blend of off-road prowess and luxurious refinement, defying German rivals with ease.

title: 2026 Lexus NX Lineup Shifts Heavily Toward Hybrids
description: Lexus has released pricing and updates for one of its most important models, the NX. descriptionSummary: Lexus has unveiled pricing and enhancements for its highly regarded NX model, a compact luxury crossover that pits itself against stalwarts like the Acura RDX and BMW X3 with its upscale ambiance and refined sensibilities.

title: Cadillac Escalade Sees Steepest 2025 Price Increase Yet
description: The Cadillac Escalade has long been the sort of vehicle that says as much about its owner as it does about Cadillac. descriptionSummary: The Cadillac Escalade exudes opulence, reflecting the stature of its owner as much as the brand itself. A ubiquitous presence in the luxury SUV scene, it's a coveted status symbol that commands attention from celebrities and high-net-worth individuals.

descriptionSummary: The US market offers a limited selection of compact hatchbacks, but those seeking a budget-friendly and practical option still have several excellent choices. One such contender has seen a significant shift in its lineup for the 2026 model year.

title: Nissan uses this cool tech to improve engine efficiency

title: MG plans major expansion with 13 new models in two years

description: The cuts amount to about 40% of the staff at its Hethel headquarters.

title: Ford F-150 Lightning SuperTruck Just Set A Supercar-Crushing Nürburgring Lap Time

title: This Flashy Diamond Watch Might Be the Only Bugatti You Can Own

descriptionSummary: Ford's CEO recently clarified that there won't be an electric Mustang sports car anytime soon. However, the company did launch an electrified crossover called a Mustang in 2020, sparking some confusion over the brand's future plans.

title: New Study Confirms: EVs Are Cleaner Than Gas Cars Everywhere in the U.S.
description: A new study from the University of Michigan found that driving an electrified vehicle will reduce greenhouse gas emissions compared to those produced by a gasoline car, regardless of where you live, so long as you live within the contiguous United States. descriptionSummary: A recent University of Michigan research project reveals that electric vehicles significantly decrease greenhouse gas emissions in comparison to their gasoline-powered counterparts across the contiguous US, regardless of regional differences.

title: Rolls-Royce Won’t Like This Feature in the Upcoming Genesis GV90

title: Car Loans Now Last Longer Than Presidential Terms
description: Remember the time when a four-year car loan felt like forever? In 2025, however, the average car loan term now stretches to nearly six full years of monthly payments. That's longer than a presidential term and just shy of outlasting two midterm elections. This dramatic shift represents a seismic ...
titleSummary: "Car Loans Extended Beyond Politicians' Tenures, Leaving Borrowers in Long-Term Debt Bind"
descriptionSummary: Car loans are getting longer, with the average term now approaching six years - a span that surpasses a presidency and approaches two election cycles. This significant change reflects a profound shift in consumer borrowing habits and automotive financing norms.

title: One of the Last Manual Corvettes Offered With Just 7k Miles
description: The Chevrolet Corvette, in its current iteration, has been upholding the nameplate's reputation to a higher standard. descriptionSummary: The latest Corvette sets a new benchmark for the iconic brand, eclipsing expectations with blistering lap times and earning widespread acclaim as one of America's greatest performance cars. Its mid-engined design is redefining what's possible under the 'Vette umbrella.

descriptionSummary: As vehicle technology advances at breakneck speed, many new innovations have little impact on the act of driving itself. title: Travelers Beware: Fake Taxi Drivers Found Operating at LAX

descriptionSummary: Electric vehicles often command a premium price tag upfront, yet they offer several advantages that offset the cost. Lower fueling costs, reduced maintenance needs, and an emerging financial incentive are helping to make them a more attractive option for some drivers.

descriptionSummary: Electric powertrains are set to revolutionize the pickup truck market, with established players like Ford and Chevrolet already making significant strides alongside innovative newcomers and fledgling startups.

description: A tragic crash in Texas has raised serious questions about Tesla’s Cybertruck. descriptionSummary: A devastating crash in Texas has sparked concerns about Tesla's Cybertruck safety after a driver lost control of the vehicle, which crashed into a concrete barrier and caught fire, causing severe damage to the occupant's remains.

title: European Automakers Warn That Combustion Engine Ban Isn't Possible

title: Tesla’s New Low Power Mode Is Great, But Could Be A Security Risk

descriptionSummary: Tesla is continually refining its vehicles through software enhancements. One upcoming addition is a low-power parking mode that minimizes energy consumption while the car is stationary, a feature likely to delight many owners.

title: Next-Gen Ford Mustang Secures Its Future With GT500 Revival and V8 Power

descriptionSummary: BMW's legendary taglines, once synonymous with exhilarating experiences behind the wheel, still evoke a sense of pure driving pleasure. Even as their focus shifts towards luxury and technology, BMWs remain quintessentially about delivering thrilling performance.

title: Ayrton Senna’s Beautiful Mercedes 190 E 2.3-16 Could Fetch Over $300k At Auction
